title: Ramp Function Generator
name: LGF_RampCI
description: Generates a speed curve based on an interpolation point table with linear interpolation.

input.name: defaultOutValue
input.description: Value for pre-assignment of the output variable

input.name: contStepNbr
input.description: Number of the next interpolation point for continuing

input.name: contStepTime
input.description: Remaining time to continue to the interpolation point

input.name: start
input.description: Run down the interpolation point table

output.name: actTimeTable
output.description: Interpolation point table will be edited

output.name: remainTime
output.description: Remaining time until reaching the next interpolation point

output.name: error
output.description: Error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: subfunctionStatus
output.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks

user_defined_types.name: LGF_typeRampTimeTable
user_defined_types.description: Data type for setup a speed curve

member.name: outputValue
member.description: Setpoint Value to reach by the interpolation curve

member.name: time
member.description: Time until the interpolation point is reached

description_zh: 一个函数块FB，用于根据插值点表生成线性插值的速度曲线。该函数块可以处理启动、保持、继续、循环操作以及更新时间等功能。它接收一个包含设定值和达到该设定值所需时间的数组作为输入，并生成一个输出值，该值在设定的时间内线性变化。函数块还可以报告当前步骤编号、剩余时间、总时间、剩余总时间以及错误状态和状态代码。
